content.raw:
Hi all,

I got gazebo 1.6.1 from http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/gazebo-1.6.1.tar.bz2 and in compile time I got this error:
```
#!shell

[ 17%] Building CXX object gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/SystemPaths.cc.o
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc: In member function ‘std::string gazebo::common::SystemPaths::FindFile(const string&, bool)’:
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:11: error: expected type-specifier
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: expected unqualified-id before ‘::’ token
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: expected ‘)’ before ‘::’ token
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: expected ‘{’ before ‘::’ token
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: ‘::filesystem_error’ has not been declared
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: note: suggested alternative:
/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/operations.hpp:980:30: note:   ‘boost::filesystem::filesystem_error’
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:49: error: ‘_e’ was not declared in this scope
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:51: error: expected ‘;’ before ‘)’ token
make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/SystemPaths.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

The error source is in line 317, catch(boost::filesystem3::filesystem_error &_e)
Replacing it to catch(boost::filesystem::filesystem_error &_e) the compilation was successfull.

I don't know if it is a problem with my boost library (1.53) or if it is a typing error.

I create a new issue [issue #633](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/633/segmentation-fault-when-running-gazebo-161) to group info about segmentation fault of a successfully compiled gazebo 1.6.1
content.html:
Hi all,

I got gazebo 1.6.1 from http://gazebosim.org/assets/distributions/gazebo-1.6.1.tar.bz2 and in compile time I got this error:

[ 17%] Building CXX object gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/SystemPaths.cc.o
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc: In member function ‘std::string gazebo::common::SystemPaths::FindFile(const string&, bool)’:
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:11: error: expected type-specifier
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: expected unqualified-id before ‘::’ token
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: expected ‘)’ before ‘::’ token
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: expected ‘{’ before ‘::’ token
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: error: ‘::filesystem_error’ has not been declared
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:29: note: suggested alternative:
/usr/local/include/boost/filesystem/operations.hpp:980:30: note:   ‘boost::filesystem::filesystem_error’
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:49: error: ‘_e’ was not declared in this scope
/home/dvaz/src/gazebo-1.6.1/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:317:51: error: expected ‘;’ before ‘)’ token
make[2]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/SystemPaths.cc.o] Error 1
make[1]: *** [gazebo/common/CMakeFiles/gazebo_common.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2

The error source is in line 317, catch(boost::filesystem3::filesystem_error &_e) Replacing it to catch(boost::filesystem::filesystem_error &_e) the compilation was successfull.

I don't know if it is a problem with my boost library (1.53) or if it is a typing error.

I create a new issue issue #633 to group info about segmentation fault of a successfully compiled gazebo 1.6.1
